Your health visitor will be 
available to talk to you, but 
it is important that you talk 
honestly to your partner, 
friends or family about how 
you feel.
Being a parent means 
constantly experiencing new 
events and carrying out new 
tasks. You will have to learn a 
new set of skills to cope with 
these situations. Knowing how 
to be a parent does not come 
automatically. It is something 
that you learn over time.
